document_data.name: Rold
document_data.mainbody: '''Rold''' was a guard in [[Shadowdale]] as of the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: He had great calm and presence of mind even in the most awkward moments.{{cite book/Spellfire/Paperback 1988|250-251|12}}{{cite book/Spellfire/Paperback 2005||14}}
document_data.Relationships: He was the uncle of [[Naera]], a fact he preferred not to bring up around [[Torm (adventurer)|Torm]]. He had great respect for the adventurer.
document_data.History:
He claimed to have seen something of the road Torm (of the [[Knights of Myth Drannor]]) walked, strongly implying he had been an adventurer.

In the {{YearlinkName|1357}}, he was the one to take Torm from the arms of a wench, his niece Naera, to keep guard on the ''[[spellfire]]'' wielder [[Shandril Shessair]], then a guest of the castle.{{cite book/Spellfire/Paperback 1988|240-243|12}} The next morning, he was relieved Shandril wasn't staying at the castle longer.

Per some early reports, Rold was also a guard during the tests that [[Elminster]] did on ''spellfire''.{{cite book/Spellfire/Paperback 1988|306|14}} Those were not repeated in more definitive reports.Rold is not named during ''spellfire'' tests in the 2005 reissue.
